name: AstroBlast VR
description: Play the timeless classic in a 21st century finish. AstroBlast VR brings the feel of arcades back, only this time compete against players from all around the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 Processor: intel i5-4590 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
